images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $10.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Stanfields. The average
  contract duration was 1.57 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $28.0M. The longest
  contract was 1.57 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $28.0M.
lookup_name: 'STANFIELDS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '10.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '0%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '135.6K'
s424_mean_duration: '1.57'
s421_mean_contract_value: '28.0M'
s425_max_duration: '1.57'
s422_max_contract_value: '28.0M'
---
